somesay# Decode certificate base64

```text 
echo "<secret>" |base64 -d| openssl x509 -text |less
```
```sh
MASTER/etc/kubernetes
#ls
admin.conf  controller-manager.conf  kubelet.conf  manifests  pki  scheduler.conf

#cat admin.conf 
apiVersion: v1
clusters:
- cluster:
    certificate-authority-data: 
    server: https://192.168.120.138:6443
  name: kubernetes
contexts:
- context:
    cluster: kubernetes
    user: kubernetes-admin
  name: kubernetes-admin@kubernetes
current-context: kubernetes-admin@kubernetes
kind: Config
preferences: {}
users:
- name: kubernetes-admin
  user:
    client-certificate-data: 
    client-key-data: 
MASTER/etc/kubernetes
```
# Decoding Example
```sh
MASTER/etc/kubernetes
#echo "" |base64 -d| openssl x509 -text |less

Result:
Certificate:
    Data:
        Version: 3 (0x2)
        Serial Number: 2453173732732641293 (0x220b6c832fd9200d)
        Signature Algorithm: sha256WithRSAEncryption
        Issuer: CN = kubernetes
        Validity
            Not Before: Jul 19 23:58:21 2020 GMT
            Not After : Jul 20 02:13:13 2021 GMT
        Subject: O = system:masters, CN = kubernetes-admin
        Subject Public Key Info:
            Public Key Algorithm: rsaEncryption
                RSA Public-Key: (2048 bit)
                Modulus:
                    00:a8:cb:7d:d5:36:48:02:6e:9d:2c:b9:4c:fc:44:
                    be:9b:b4:40:52:51:90:16:73:d6:e0:c5:b7:24:c1:
                    a9:c6:09:f0:d2:10:7c:c6:82:5e:98:a9:7c:13:43:
                    5d:84:60:5f:04:fa:6d:03:8e:19:09:04:cb:38:34:
                    48:bc:94:10:8b:c6:96:4c:15:d8:eb:a8:ae:24:4b:
                    5b:4c:89:7d:7a:bb:a9:96:ec:49:6b:45:f8:79:e6:
                    64:7c:fb:91:00:66:10:1e:03:0c:5b:34:da:cf:f7:
                    fa:ed:fd:cf:a9:17:e9:62:85:41:92:64:82:06:ca:
                    e2:87:95:08:70:7d:ab:c2:c1:75:0d:f5:99:87:94:
                    b3:67:77:f4:3b:a6:6c:24:5f:86:d8:63:1f:60:f8:
                    f9:3b:7b:3f:39:ba:a8:15:8e:e4:2b:48:b0:24:e6:
                    43:d0:6c:de:8e:74:09:37:6d:9b:9b:2d:94:a5:4b:
                    5f:55:de:d9:50:6a:24:75:81:e7:f9:43:f2:05:a4:
                    eb:31:bf:0b:4b:76:65:ee:80:eb:da:74:6a:98:10:
                    98:d4:2a:e0:19:26:13:de:6c:b5:6a:8f:e0:b1:bc:
                    e8:45:33:23:6e:ae:a7:9b:3f:02:97:36:14:3a:4c:
                    68:cb:b1:59:24:6c:25:b7:7a:08:40:79:c5:df:c1:
                    50:99
                Exponent: 65537 (0x10001)
        X509v3 extensions:
            X509v3 Key Usage: critical
                Digital Signature, Key Encipherment
:
